net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Class ResourceWriterUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceWriterUtil

  • public final class ResourceWriterUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to write resource content to a output stream.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException
      Exception to denote an error accessing a resource.

    • Method Detail

      • rfc2047decode

        public static java.lang.String rfc2047decode(java.lang.String s)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Decode a string according to RFC 2047.
        Parameters:
        s - the string.
        Returns:
        String, will be null if the argument is null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the string is not properly encoded.

      • rfc2047encode

        public static java.lang.String rfc2047encode(java.lang.String s)
        Encode a string according to RFC 2047. If the string does not need encoding the argument is returned.
        Parameters:
        s - the string.
        Returns:
        String, will be null if the argument is null.

      • setHeaders

        public static boolean setHeaders(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                 java.lang.String resourceId,
                 net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Set the response headers for the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        req - the HTTP request object.
        resp - the HTTP response object.
        resourceId - the resource ID.
        resource - the resource.
        Returns:
        true if setting of headers was successful.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • setHeaders

        public static boolean setHeaders(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                 java.lang.String resourceId,
                 net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource,
                 Resource.IsolationLevel isolationLevel,
                 ResponseHeader... headersToSkip)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Set the response headers for the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        req - the HTTP request object.
        resp - the HTTP response object.
        resourceId - the resource ID.
        resource - the resource.
        isolationLevel - the isolation level to use, may be null.
        headersToSkip - optional headers to skip.
        Returns:
        true if setting of headers was successful.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • writeResource

        public static void writeResource(java.lang.String resourceId,
                 net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource,
                 java.io.OutputStream out)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException
        Write a resource to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the resource id.
        resource - the resource.
        out - the outputstream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException - if the content of the resource could not be accessed.

        Write a resource to the output stream.
        Parameters:

        resource - the resource.
        out - the outputstream.
        range - optional range to output.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException - if the content of the resource could not be accessed.
